Row.Text: Colonial Assembly
Colonial officials have decided to form an Assembly to legislate their own budgets. They assure us that this is in the interests of the nation and not a step toward independence.
That sounds reasonsable.
+{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment and +{2_Num}.
A Colonial Assembly has been opened at {2_CityDesc}.
Colonial Assembly
The Colonial Assembly has increased the colony's profits for this year.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Colonial Assembly
The Colonial Assembly is preparing for a vote to remove our civilization's emblem from their local flag.
This vote cannot be allowed.
{4_Num} [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' Sentiment.
We can see no harm in it.
+{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment and +{4_Num} [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' Sentiment.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} will not proceed with a vote to remove our civilization's emblem from their flag.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} is preparing for a vote to remove our civilization's emblem from their flag.
Colonial Assembly
The Colonial Assembly has voted to keep our civilization's emblem on their flag.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty to the city's Governor's Mansion for 20 turns.
Colonial Assembly
The Colonial Assembly has voted to remove our civilization's emblem from their flag.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to the city's Governor's Mansion for 20 turns.
Colonial Assembly
The Colonial Assembly has requested that we grant them additional legislative powers over their government.
We won't allow this.
{4_Num} [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' Sentiment.
We can see no harm in it.
+{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to the city's Governor's Mansion.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} has been denied additional legislative powers.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} has been granted additional legislative powers.
Colonial Assembly
Members of the Colonial Assembly have been evading its tax duties, costing us precious income.
Root out those responsible.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} has been audited following irregular tax payments.
Colonial Assembly
The Colonial Assembly has requested that we grant them additional rights when it comes to managing local trade.
We won't allow this.
{4_Num} [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' Sentiment.
We can see no harm in it.
+{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold to the city's Governor's Mansion.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} has been denied additional trading rights.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} has been granted additional trading rights.
Colonial Assembly
Certain members of the Colonial Assembly have decided to push for independence. However, the Assembly at large does not appear responsible for such a plot.
To arms against these rebels then!
Three Rebel Units appear near the city and +{2_Num}.
Members of the Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} have risen up in arms.
Colonial Company
A private investor has requested that we grant them an exclusive charter to establish a company in the colony.
Very well then.
No. These rights belong with the state.
{1_Num} and +5% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in the city.
We have granted an exclusive charter to establish a company in {2_CityDesc}.
We have denied an exclusive charter to establish a company in {2_CityDesc}.
Colonial Migration
A wave of immigrants have flocked to the colony, in search of opportunity and wealth. They will, of course, find only hardship and want, but who are we to deny them?
Excellent. They can get right to work.
Re-direct their passage to the Capital instead.
The city gains +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.
{1_Yield} and the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.
A wave of immigrants have settled in the colony of {2_CityDesc}.
A wave of immigrants have settled in the Capital.
Colonial Mission
Missionaries have requested that we fund their passage to {1_CityDesc}, so that they can spread the faith to the frontier.
Very well. We shall fund their passage.
They will stay behind.
{1_Yield} and the city receives a Missionary.
No effect.
A religious mission has been sent to {2_CityDesc}.
A religious mission has been denied passage to {2_CityDesc}.
Penal Colony
Due to the slow growth of the colony, our advisors have recommended that we send a shipment of criminals there.
An excellent idea.
This sounds too risky.
The city gains +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population. +{3_Num} [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment and -{3_Num} [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment in the Capital.
No effect.
Criminals have been shipped from the Capital to the colony at {2_CityDesc}.
Best we shut down this Colonial Assembly.
The city enters [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance for 1 turn and the city's [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment is reset.
The Colonial Assembly at {2_CityDesc} has been closed.
